des:
Using Alexa App to link Smart Assistant and discover your devices.
To get started, follow the steps: 
1.Check if your TV support Alexa: Go to TV menu to see if TV has the menu 'About -> Alexa'.
2.Click “Enable” button on this page if your TV supports Alexa.
3.To activate the TV with Alexa, please go to TV menu and select 'About -> Alexa -> Status Setting' to get the activation code.
4.Insert the code in the account linking page as requested after you have clicked “Status Setting” as described above.
5.Discover your smart TV and rename your TV in the Alexa App.

Now you can play video and music, change input source, change channels, change volume, control smart homes devices, and more. Just ask Alexa!

Sample phrases:
"Alexa, play [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, stop [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, change input to HDMI 1 [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, change channel to 7 [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, change channel to BBC [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, next channel [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, channel up [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, channel down [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, set volume to 50 [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, volume up [by 20] [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, volume down [by 20] [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, mute on [Bedroom] TV."
"Alexa, unmute on [Bedroom] TV."
"Alexa, launch Netflix [on Bedroom TV]."
"Alexa, go to Home [on Bedroom TV]."
